abstract: The move is the first major step toward making millions of videos accessible to deaf and hearing-impaired people.
snippet: The move is the first major step toward making millions of videos accessible to deaf and hearing-impaired people.
lead_paragraph: MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif.  In the first major step toward making millions of videos on YouTube accessible to deaf and hearing-impaired people, Google unveiled new technologies on Thursday that will automatically bring text captions to many videos on the site.

headline.main: Google to Add Captions, Improving YouTube Videos
headline.print_headline: Google to Add Captions, Improving YouTube Videos

abstract: Google fields questions about its Power Meter, its market strategy and the privacy of consumer data at a smart grid conference in California.
snippet: Google fields questions about its Power Meter, its market strategy and the privacy of consumer data at a smart grid conference in California.
lead_paragraph: Ed Lu, the former astronaut and now program manager for advanced products at Google, wants to be clear: Google is not interested in competing with utilities.

headline.main: Google Says It Doesn’t Want to Be a Utility

abstract: Google fields questions about its Power Meter, its market strategy and the privacy of consumer data at a smart grid conference in California.
snippet: Google fields questions about its Power Meter, its market strategy and the privacy of consumer data at a smart grid conference in California.

headline.main: Google Says It Doesn’t Want to Be a Utility
